```{r}
col <- pers[, c("INJ_SEV", "MAKE", "STATE")]
danger <- col %>%
  filter(INJ_SEV == 4) %>%
  group_by(STATE, MAKE) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
  group_by(STATE) %>%
  filter(n == max(n)) %>%
  filter(is.na(MAKE) == FALSE) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))
danger
```
